duties_responsibilities.duty: Performing preventative maintenance services on truck and trailer equipment with little or no supervision and in a timely manner.
Repairing and troubleshooting major components such as engines, transmissions, and differentials, including replacing complete assemblies, turbochargers, fuel system components, etc.
Keeping work area clean and safe.
Using Penske’s tools and technologies to log, research, and complete repairs, including basic vehicle diagnostics.
Learning new skills through Penske’s technician training.
Working on other projects and tasks as assigned by the supervisor.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent preferred; vocational or technical certification in vehicle repair preferred
